mapper.insert: insert into article(id, title, content, digest, wordNum) value(null, #{title}, #{content}, #{digest}, #{wordNum})
mapper.select: select a.*, c.id categoryId, c.name categoryName, ac2.name coverImg from article a left join article_category ac on ac.article_id = a.id left join category c on ac.category_id = c.id left join article_cover ac2 on a.id = ac2.article_id where a.`is_delete` != 1 order by a.id desc
select * from article where id = #{id} and is_delete != 1

select a.*, c.id categoryId, c.name categoryName, ac2.name coverImg from article a left join article_category ac on a.id = ac.article_id left join category c on c.id = ac.category_id left join article_cover ac2 on a.id = ac2.article_id where a.id = #{val} and a.is_delete != 1

select count(*) articleNum, sum(wordNum) wordsNum, (select count(distinct real_ip) as visitorsNum from site_history ) visitorsNum, (select count(real_ip) as visitNum from site_history) visitNum from article where is_delete != 1
mapper.update: update article set like_count = like_count + 1 where id = #{articleId} and is_delete != 1
